snippet.title: Amanda the Adventurer 2 Is Out Now!
snippet.description:
Join Riley just moments after the encounter with Amanda that led to the destruction of the television in the attic, where a mysterious figure reveals themself.

Embark on a journey to the Kensdale Public Library to uncover the truth behind the tapes and the dark secrets they hold, but be careful—Amanda knows Riley is out there, and she isn’t the only one searching for them.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2826800/Amanda_the_Adventurer_2/
